analysis.description:

	- markAllRead() (/unique_chucks/43/0x897ce268e75b8eaa8ecb07a2e4802e3d0b2c3da6.sol#123-124)

	- inboxes (/unique_chucks/43/0x897ce268e75b8eaa8ecb07a2e4802e3d0b2c3da6.sol#107-108)
